org.point85.workschedule

Class RotationSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.point85.workschedule.RotationSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RotationSegment>

    public class RotationSegment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RotationSegment>
    This class represents part of an entire rotation. The segment starts with a shift and includes a count of the number of days on followed by the number of days off.
